name: ROC MONNIS
main_text: ROC Monnis is located in Monnis Tower. Designed for a downtown office environment, we aim to provide fast and easy service. The 3-group Victoria Arduino Eagle One ensures world-class espresso quality. Our compact kitchen can prepare sandwiches and salads for breakfast, as well as a varied daily lunch menu, catering perfectly to Monnis Tower employees and other customers in the area.
address: Address:   R.O.C. Monnis, 1st Floor, Monnis Tower , Chinggis avenue, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
